Name: Adventure Minesweeper
About the game: Traditional RPG elements are combined with landmines, and there are various hand-drawn animated beauties. Adventure, puzzle solving, beauty three wishes are met at once Game features: * Operate epic slimes to break through various mine-stomping levels * 10 difficulty levels can be played * After breaking through 5 difficulty levels, special adventure levels can be unlocked
